metadata.Title: CVE-2020-27066 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In xfrm6_tunnel_free_spi of net/ipv6/xfrm6_tunnel.c, there is a possible use after free due to improper locking. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID: A-168043318

notes.Note: sbeattie> unclear what issue/kernel commit google is referencing here.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
